title: Slow cooker beef stew
ingredients: ['900g diced stewing steak', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 bay leaf', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 onion, chopped', '350ml beef stock', '3 potatoes, diced', '4 carrots, sliced', '1 stick celery, sliced']
